tool_description: Moxtra delivers a mobile-first collaboration platform that can be embedded within existing applications, allowing developers to deploy a powerful mobile solution – quickly and affordably, without long development cycles. We transform innovative mobile apps and legacy software solutions alike into tools for social business, keeping distributed teams engaged and productive inside their existing workflow.
name: Moxtra
title: Moxtra

api_list.name: Schedule Meet
api_list.description: Schedule a meet for future time
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://moxtra.p.rapidapi.com/meets/schedule"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "moxtra.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:

api_list.name: Add Message to Binder Chat
api_list.description: Add a message to a binder chat identified by {binder_id}

api_list.name: Remove user from binder with email
api_list.description: Remove an user from a binder identified by {binder_id} with email

api_list.name: Update user profile
api_list.description: Update a user identified by {user_id} with input new value(s).

api_list.name: Create Binder
api_list.description: Create a binder identified by {user_id}
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://moxtra.p.rapidapi.com/me/binders"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "moxtra.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Clone binder
api_list.description: Duplicate/Clone the binder identified by {binder_id}

api_list.name: Add team users to a binder
api_list.description: Add users from the same team into the binder identified by {binder_id}

api_list.description: Rename a binder name identified by {binder_id}

api_list.name: Create Category
api_list.description: Create category identified by {user_id}

api_list.name: Copy Pages to Binder
api_list.description: Copy all pages from one binder to another binder identified by {binder_id}

api_list.name: Add Web Link Page
api_list.description: Add a web link kpage into the binder identified by {binder_id}

api_list.name: Add Page Comment
api_list.description: Add a comment to the page identified by {page_id} and {binder_id}

api_list.name: Rename Category
api_list.description: Rename a category name identified by {user_id} and {category_id}

api_list.name: Assign Binders to a Category
api_list.description: Assign binders to a category identified by {user_id} and {category_id}

api_list.name: Remove user from binder with unique id
api_list.description: Remove user from binder with unique id

api_list.name: Add Annotation
api_list.description: Add annotation to a page identified by {page_id} and {binder_id}

api_list.name: Add a Todo item
api_list.description: Add a todo item in the binder identified by {binder_id}

api_list.name: Invite Contacts via Email
api_list.description: Invite users to become contacts of the user identified by {user_id} via email.

api_list.name: Upload User Picture
api_list.description: Upload a user's propfile picture identified by {user_id} via multipart/form-data.

required_parameters.name: file
required_parameters.description: Profile photo, encoded as form data.

api_list.name: Update Meet
api_list.description: Update a scheduled meet identified by {session_key}

api_list.name: Page Upload
api_list.description: Upload pages to the binder identified by {binder_id} via multipart / form-data

required_parameters.name: file
required_parameters.description: Actual file that is uploaded to the binder

api_list.name: Copy Some Pages to Binder
api_list.description: Copy some pages from one binder to another binder identified by {binder_id}

api_list.name: Invite users to Meet
api_list.description: Invite users to join meet via email or unique_id
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://moxtra.p.rapidapi.com/meets/inviteuser"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "moxtra.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
